code: import React from'react';import{CurrentUserContext}from'../contexts/CurrentUserContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Card(_ref){var card=_ref.card,onCardClick=_ref.onCardClick,onCardLike=_ref.onCardLike,onCardDelete=_ref.onCardDelete;var currentUser=React.useContext(CurrentUserContext);var isOwn=card.owner._id===currentUser._id;var cardDeleteButtonClassName="".concat(isOwn?'card__delete-btn_active btn-opacity-change':'card__delete-btn');var isLiked=card.likes.some(function(i){return i._id===currentUser._id;});var cardLikeButtonClassName="card__like-btn btn-opacity-change ".concat(isLiked?'card__like-btn_active':' ');function handleClick(){onCardClick(card);}function handleLikeClick(){onCardLike(card);}function handleDeleteClick(){onCardDelete(card);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleDeleteClick,type:"button",className:cardDeleteButtonClassName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{onClick:handleClick,src:card.link,alt:card.name,className:"card__image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card__content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"card__title",children:card.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLikeClick,type:"button",className:cardLikeButtonClassName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"card__likes-number",children:card.likes.length})]})]})]});}export default Card;
